metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6413 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The "OpenID Connect Relying Party and OAuth 2.0 Resource Server" (akamod_auth_openidc) module before 2.1.6 for the Apache HTTP Server does notskip OIDC_CLAIM_ and OIDCAuthNHeader headers in an "AuthType oauth20"configuration, which allows remote attackers to bypass authentication viacrafted HTTP traffic.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
